author: paulsp
msg: Now compiles under jdk 1.3. Uses Locale(language, "") instead of Locale(language)

author: taylor
msg: - rollback to TurbineLocalization service, multiple resource files failing with new service

author: morciuch
msg: Allow to customize control for each portlet in the layout customizer (see Bugzilla bug # 13252).

List of available controls is limited to ones with parameter "simple" set to "true" in control registry. Currently, there are 3 available controls: TitlePortletControl, BoxControl and ClearPortletControl.

author: raphael
msg: Add "style" attribute to Portlet parameter DTD

msg: Update to registry documentation. Should now be complete
